attributes.action: Pay all NHS workers a special one off bonus for all of their efforts in 2020.
attributes.additional_details:
NHS staff are very poorly paid in relation to the commitment, effort and outcome of their work.  This year above any since the creation of the NHS they have shown why they the workers are so critical to the wellbeing and survival of our nation.

Please show them appreciation where it really matters and give them a one-off payment to honour their work.  This should be a minimum of £1000 per person.

(FYI I do not work for the NHS).
attributes.background: The payment should reflect and reward their enormous efforts and therefore should be a minimum £1000 per person.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/321150
